alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 28 at 4:16PM ChST until December 29 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CHST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph expected. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Tinian and Saipan. * WHEN...Until 6 PM ChST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds could settle down slightly tonight, then build again Thursday. The shear line should then weaken enough for Thursday night and Friday that we will stay below advisory criteria.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
